snippet: David West, Danny Granger and George Hill led Indiana in scoring, and the Pacers beat the Magic on Monday to tie their first-round series at 1-1.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers beat Orlando Magic, 93-78, to even their first-round playoff series at one game apiece; other NBA items noted.
lead_paragraph: David West, Danny Granger and George Hill led Indiana in scoring, and the Pacers beat the Magic on Monday to tie their first-round series at 1-1.

headline.print_headline: Pacers Tie Series With the Magic
headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs: Celtics’ Rondo Suspended for Game 2
headline.main: Pacers Tie Series With the Magic
